named-query.name: READ_FULFILLMENT_GROUPS_BY_ORDER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT fulfillmentGroup FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.FulfillmentGroup fulfillmentGroup WHERE fulfillmentGroup.orderId = :orderId

named-query.name: READ_DEFAULT_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_BY_ORDER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT defaultFulfillmentGroup FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.DefaultFulfillmentGroup defaultFulfillmentGroup WHERE defaultFulfillmentGroup.orderId = :orderId
